::KitKat::

She sat down in the captain's chair and looked at the monitor.  She 
looked at Black Aracnia.  She heard the words, but wasn't sure of the 
intentions behind them.  She wanted to talk face to face, afraid that 
thier transmission might be picked up or tapped right now.  
"Black Aracnia. If your honest about your intentions, then I will 
invite you and one other bot to my base.  But no others may join 
you.  No tricks, no treatchery.  You and your partner will be given 
safe passage to our base and then leave freely.  I give you my word 
as a warrior,  I shall not have any harm come to you and your escort. 
But I will admit, this idea of uniting the pred groups is appealing.  
I have had the same thoughts for a while myself. Perhaps an allience 
will benefit us all. Please accept my invitation and join me here.  
I'll send you the coordinants."  She pushed a few buttons and sent 
out the directions.  "Notify me when we can expect you."

She felt her spark leap at teh chance of joining the groups 
together.  But she didn't trust Black Aracnia completely yet.  No 
true leader would just hand over thier group, unless there was aother 
plan or alterior motive, but perhaps there was a chanse that Black 
Aracnia was being honest and was thinking of the group and not her 
own command.  Her mind then thought about the true predacon programs 
and knew that an honest pred was like a evil maximal, they didn't 
exist.  She turned off the commlink and disconnected the video link.  
She now could talk freely.  She looked up at Destructor, "What do you 
think?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia turned to the image of Kitkat on the monitor. She 
looked tired, 
> beaten, ragged. She was definetly under alot of stress lately. "We 
can hold 
> them over the comm-link, its not top secret."
>     She took a seat and began, "Now, both of us are capable leaders 
with 
> capable crews, but the Predacons seem to be getting more and more 
distnat 
> from each other. Thats why I wish to join your group. Together, 
under your 
> leadership, and with my own input, I think both of our teams could 
unite the 
> Predacons for good. Right now, our main problem is Hell Beast and 
Megatron. 
> Hell Beast left and I cant locate him anywhere, I fear that he 
might decide 
> to take Megatron out himself, and if he fails Megatron would surely 
convert 
> him. Together they would be unstopable. So, what do you say? Do I 
have the 
> honor of joining your team or what?" She said, truthfully and with 
no hint of 
> treachery. Aracnia really did want to join with Kitkat....the 
backstabbing 
> games were over. This was a time to be serious.
> 
>     Tarantulas and Aerostreak limed after Hell Beast, a good 
distance behinde 
> them. Tarantulas wasnt going to let this chance pass him by, to 
find Megatron 
> that is. Once located he would tell Aracnia and get all the credit.
>     "Hurry up bird brain! Were going to lose them!" The spider 
hissed at 
> Aerostreak who scooted after the spider in vhicle form. He was hard 
to keep 
> up with.
>     "Shut up you fatt assed spider! I cant go as fast as you!" He 
said back, 
> and looked on the scanners to see that Hell Beast and Gremlin came 
to an 
> abrupt stop at a moutian. "Why stop at a mountian?"
>     They continued on in the artic cold until the mountian came 
into view. 
> The signitures of Hell Beast and Gremlin were at the base of the 
mound. 
> Tarantulas and Aerostreak stoped and watched.
> 
>     "Who the hell is it? How did they find me?" Megatron screamed 
at the 
> Maximal counterparts, who still didnt realize they were serving a 
Predacon. 
> He glared a them, "Well damn it?"
>     Nighteyes spoke, "Sir, they claim to be Senetor Hell Beast and 
Major 
> Gremlin. Ive never heard of them before." She then put her head 
down and went 
> back in line.
>     Megatron thought a moment. This could be a trap, or a very good 
> oppertunity. With Ol' Hell Beast on his side, they would make an 
exceptional 
> fighting force. If he were to talk to Hell Beast himself.....
>     "Take them to the main entrance. I will meet them there. I want 
you armed 
> and ready to fight if nessecery. Understood?" He said getting up.
>     Waspinator nodded and left to let Hell Beast and Gremlin inside 
while the 
> three Maximals grabed wepons and left. Megatron prepared himself 
for what 
> might be a meeting of bloodshed, or a meeting of destiny.
